name: Lets-Plot in SciView
description:
The plugin adds support for interactive plots in IntelliJ-based IDEs with the enabled Scientific mode

The Scientific mode in PyCharm and in IntelliJ IDEA Python plugin provides support for interactive scientific computing and data visualization.

To learn more about Scientific mode check these help pages:
  • Scientific mode in PyCharm
  • Scientific mode in IntelliJ IDEA

Lets-Plot is an open-source plotting library for statistical data.

This plugin requires the Lets-Plot Python package to be installed in the project Python environment.

The plugin is 100% compatible with Lets-Plot v 1.5.2. The compatibility will be kept up for the later versions of Lets-Plot.
notes:
Changes in version 1.0.5:
  • The Save as File action saves 2X scaled image to preserve the image quality.
  • Built with Lets-Plot v1.5.2 (was v1.4.2). See Lets-Plot CHANGELOG to learn what's new since v1.4.2.

Changes in version 1.0.4:
  • Plugin compatibility was extended to builds 203.* of the platform.

Changes in version 1.0.3:
  • Fixed thumbnail icons in SciView.
  • Improved the quality of image on Save as File.

Changes in version 1.0.2:
  • Initial release of the plugin.
